conclusion: Need to calculate gravitational force exerted by remaining part of sphere on point mass m after smaller sphere of radius R/2 is removed.
Use principle of superposition and shell theorem.
Gravitational force F_original exerted by original sphere on point mass m is G * Mm / (4R^2).
Volume of original sphere is (4/3) * pi * R^3.
Volume of removed sphere is (1/6) * pi * R^3.
Mass of removed sphere M_removed is M/8.
Gravitational force F_removed exerted by removed sphere on point mass m is G * Mm / (18R^2).
Net gravitational force F exerted by remaining part of sphere on point mass m is G * Mm / R^2 * (7/36).
Final gravitational force F is G * 7Mm / (36R^2).
